Case: Sariya-Mason-DB-08-19-2022
Client: Sariya Mason
__Claim: 04830025 Sariya Mason - Dog Bite__
CC: Aaron Whaley [agwhaley@whaleylawfirm.com](mailto:agwhaley@whaleylawfirm.com)
Good afternoon Nichole,
 Please find attached our office's letter of representation for the
above referenced incident. Your insured's animal (Canine - German Shepherd)
was left unrestrained & unattended on August 19, 2022.
 Our client is a minor neighbor of your insured and was attempting to
walk down her driveway when the animal darts across 2 yards and attacks our
client. We have attached a five (5) minute Ring Doorbell video showing the
events unfold. The animal can be seen moving about the front yard of the
yellow house at the beginning, then at approximate 1:24, our client can be
seen coming down her driveway to the right of the screen. The animal
immediately darts toward & attacks her unprovoked. We have been advised
this is not the 1st incident of this type concerning your insured's animal.
 Please contact our office as soon as possible to discuss an amicable
settlement. We look forward to working with you on this matter. If you have
any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us directly to discuss
them in further detail.
Sarena M. Tuttle
Litigation Paralegal &
Workers' Compensation Case Manager
The Whaley Law Firm
712 Lyndon Lane
Louisville, KY 40222
D: (502) 357-9971
O: (502) 583-4022 ext 104
E: Sarena@WhaleyLawFirm.com
(PLEASE NOTE NEW EMAIL ADDRESS)

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: RingCentral
9:31 AM
To: aaron whaley
[image: Logo] [image: Logo]
[image: Logo] Voice Message
------------------------------
Dear aaron whaley,
You have a new voice message:
*From:* SBM PLLC LAW (502) 625-1678
*Received:* Thursday, February 22, 2024 at 9:31 AM
*Length:* 01:00
*To:* (502) 583-4022 * 101 aaron whaley
*Voicemail Preview:*
"Hi, Aaron, this is Matt Lonergan at Barton's. Maloney. I am calling
regarding Jefferson Circuit case number 23c6039. Your client is Serse
Thomas. On behalf of Sarah Mason, you filed a motion to compel for Monday.
I was just calling to see the proposed order that you tendered gives us 14
days from the date of the order to get the discovery responses in. We are
working on those and we almost have them done. I anticipate we should be
able to get them to you well before that time. We just have a little bit of
a language barrier with our client and we are kind of shorthanded Right
now, but we are in an all day mediation on Monday, so I just was wanting to
reach out to see if you would be willing to do an agreed order giving us
until march 11th to get those done. That is 14 days from the 26th, which
would be motion hour. If you could give me a Call back when you get this
message. My direct line number is 526-25-1678. Thank you."
